en: Dominique asked you to 'get a handle on your self-esteem and internal locus of control'. That sounds rather complicated, but you resolve to give it your best.

It takes some time. You read a few articles, skim a few books, and do a lot of journaling and soul-searching. Eventually you have a list of techniques and a deeper understanding of yourself, which you hope will help you keep criticism from becoming personal.
However, the work of sorting through all that completely exhausts you and you lose a day of work.
